attributes.additional_details:
Durban 3 is a conference supposedly against "racism", to be held in September 2011 in New York. Instead of discussing all types of racism in the world it has become exclusively devoted to attacking one country - Israel.
At the previous Durban 2 in Geneva Mr Ahmadinejad, who has already called for the destruction of Israel was allowed free reign to spout his hatred and denial of the Holocaust..
The USA, Canada, Czech Republic, Italy and The Nederlands have already said they will boycott this farce and the UK should do the same, and not encourage the rise of anti-semitism, which is already increasing alarmingly..
.
